game.name: Trulon: The Shadow Engine
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In a world of steampunk and magic you take the role of Gladia, a monster huntress set on a quest to find a cure to the disease that is spreading across Tripudia. Trulon combines adventure RPG elements with a unique card combat system.
